verse.name: v1
verse.lines: When all my labors and trials are o’er, And I am safe on that beautiful shore, Just to be near the dear Lord I adore, Will thro' the ages be glory for me.

verse.name: c
verse.lines: O that will be glory for me, Glory for me, glory for me; When by His grace I shall look on His face, That will be glory, be glory for me.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: When by the gift of His infinite grace, I am accorded in Heaven a place, Just to be there and to look on His face, Will thro' the ages be glory for me.

verse.name: v3
